In a quaint village, an invisible elephant wandered freely, leaving only whispers of its presence. Each night, villagers awoke to the sound of gentle trumpeting and the soft thud of enormous feet. Curious children would follow the noise, but the elephant remained unseen, teasing their imaginations. One day, a brave girl named Lila decided to leave out a trail of colorful flowers. To her surprise, the invisible elephant followed the path, revealing its shimmering outline under the moonlight. The villagers gasped in awe, realizing the magic that surrounded them. From that night on, they celebrated the invisible elephant, embracing the wonder of the unseen.
